content.description:
Starts on the rear side of the boulder (opposite the trail), where it is closer to the ground. The walk-off area will be on your left corner, and the start of the route is on the right hand side corner. 

  Sit start, and traverse left using the tiny pockets about head level. The tiny pockets will cease around midway of the boulder, at this point, shoot straight up and top out.
content.protection: Pad, about half way through the traverse the landing gets kind of rocky.
content.location: Rear of the Shagohod boulder, to the right of the boulders walk-off.

content.description: This is the large, squarish, freestanding boulder directly on the right as you pass by the Welcome boulder on the main trail up. Around the rear of the boulder, there is an easy walk-off that allows most families on top of the boulder allowing them to survey the entire Welcome boulder area.
